description.value: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must each make a Charisma saving throw. Whenever a target that fails this save makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must subtract 1d4 from the attack roll or save

higher_level_description.value: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.
